actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to revise the boundaries of the Hampton National Historic Site in the State of Maryland, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Revises the boundaries of the Hampton National Historic Site to include additional specified lands. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire such lands by donation, purchase, or exchange, and to administer them as part of the Hampton National Historic Site. Authorizes the appropriation of such sums as may be necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to revise the boundaries of the Hampton National Historic Site in the State of Maryland, and for other purposes.
